speakers.name: Kinuko Yasuda
speakers.biography: Kinuko used to be a heavy contributor in an open source browser engine, where she led many projects and spent non-trivial amount of time thinking about how the web can become faster.
speakers.biographyJa: Kinuko used to be a heavy contributor in an open source browser engine, where she led many projects and spent non-trivial amount of time thinking about how the web can become faster.

talk.title: How projects are born and run in a web browser engine
talk.titleJa: How projects are born and run in a web browser engine
talk.description: In this talk I will talk about a few examples and thoughts about how a project might be born and worked in a large-scale browser engine like Chromium. It's partially about scoping, designing, planning and executing, but also largely about collaboration, communication, and a lot of struggles.
talk.descriptionJa: （未翻訳）In this talk I will talk about a few examples and thoughts about how a project might be born and worked in a large-scale browser engine like Chromium. It's partially about scoping, designing, planning and executing, but also largely about collaboration, communication, and a lot of struggles.
